title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Kokopelli’s Trail – Loma, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Steven Schiff, “The perfect late Monday afternoon ride. Chasing the setting sun at the Kokopelli trail system in Loma, Colorado. A classic western desert fall ride.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Kokopelli’s Trail – Loma, Colorado appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
